title: My Pixel 3 is not downloading/installing Android 10.
content: My device is stuck on a loop trying to install Android 10 and this is the case when battery is full and on WiFi and has been the case for several days. It is stuck on the below. It isn't clear if it has downloaded but I think not as when I'm on mobile network it says the update is paused until WiFi becomes available. Please help.
